subject: p13964474
History: ETOH abuse, status post repair of esophageal perforation with leak and necrotizing pneumonia. Comparison is made with prior study, CT,. Tracheostomy tube is in a standard position. Esophageal stent is noted. There has been interval worsening of diffuse multifocal consolidation, the largest in the right lower lobe. There is no evident pneumothorax or enlarging pleural effusions. Cardiac size is normal. The mediastinum is unchanged.
Impression: Worsening right lung consolidations. Multifocal consolidations in the left lung are grossly stable.
